trigger.match: Bring me a fiery signet.
Bring me a goat's head from the demons. Mount it on a stick or something.
a side of venison
Bring me a madman's embedded whip.
a small steam gun
Bring me a shroud. Be sure it has some heft to it.
a stone disc
Bring me something golden that will keep me well fed.
a stone hammer
a storm-skin cloak
an obsidian sledgehammer
Maybe they should be rainbow disciples rather than nihilistic.
assassin's armband
Minor illusions can be just as powerful as major ones. Bring me a minor illusionist's ring.
aura of domination
axe of the third plane
My collection needs a heartbane loaded weapon in case I ever want to slaughter foes.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("pair of kzinti slaughter gloves","locker raposao")

trigger.match: My collection won't be complete without a way to tame death itself.
You don't have to learn the actual ritual, just get an implement used in dark rites.
You don't look to be all that skilled at basket weaving but perhaps you could make something nice from some gith hair.
Peel the mark off of a madman.
Pick me up a memento I can use to remember the Gith.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("amulet with a small silver sword inscribed on it")

trigger.match: Please acquire custom made leggings made of panthrodrine. I wear a size 30.
Pluck a phoenix for me please.
Bring me something truly exotic.
Pry the frozen tooth from a wild hound.
Bring me the blade of Karnath, intact preferably but I will take what I get.
a suit of dress plate
Can domesticated frozen dogs be collared\? Find out for me.
a sun staff
a unicorn horn
a viper fang
a whirl of elusive feathers
Go and de-robe the mistress of the south.
Go play the ultimate game of hot potato in the realm of earth.
black master's hood
My dagger set just won't be complete without a golden handled weapon capable of damaging werewolves.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("silver dagger with a golden handle")

trigger.match: Go play the ultimate game of hot potato in the realm of fire.
black wand with a grinning skull
My rock collection seems incomplete. See if you can turn up a blue or white stone for me.
blood red robe
No clerics have this aura, just the kzinti war leader.
Have you ever seen a katana dance\? Neither have I. Please bring me this wonder.
blue psi-blade
the broken blade of Karnath
Retrieve a dark energy lance for me.
Show me how loyal you can be.
a buckler bracelet
Dagger of the dead, what else would you expect a spirit to wield\?
Silk and velvet, but it is still just a dress of rags.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("a dress of silk and velvet rags")

trigger.match: a cape of angel feathers
Defeat a champion and bring me his sword.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("black sword of the keep","locker larin")

trigger.match: Skewer me something from the Orb.
amulet with a small silver sword inscribed on it
a crude spear
Do wild ice hounds still get collared\? Return with one if they do.
an air gun
a crumpled note
Do you think I would look good in sleeves of gold?
an aurora bow
a dagger of dark rites
Each Cabal member has a staff of office, bring me one.
an ethereal blade
Havynne's lantern
Hmm, according to my list I need the fang of a snake of some sort, like a viper.
clasp of eternal anguish
I am not sure what use the Fae have for shield bracelets, get me one so I can take a look at it.
clear psi-blade
I can't decide if a steam gun would add to my collection or not.
coarse leather boots
I could use some custom made boots.
crystal ball
What else would you call a flametongue?
dark purple robe
What is it with the fae and sharp objects that dance?
Where's the beef\? Actually, I prefer some venison.
Which is mightier, earth or air\? Bring me a gun where one pushes the other around.
Skin a rock wyrm for me please.
Why the senior has to dance with yellow I will never know. He has two so it shouldn't hurt him too bad to give one up.
Some merrily dancing fire would be appreciated.
Something easy this time\? Just grab Ralthar's weapon for me.
a dancing dagger
Even domesticated frozen dogs will yield their teeth.
a dancing katana
a dancing rapier
a decaying vest made from cracked leather
Find a bow that is truly worthy of firing ice arrows.
a devilish talisman
You might have to bleed a bit to get the red just right on the robe I would like you to gather for me.
Find me some unfinished kzinti serum; I want to make Killaris jealous.
I desire a kzinti incantation, hop to.
I desire the bow of the air lord, be a dear and fetch it for me.
devilish lance
I desire the mace of the earth lord. Be kind to an old dragon and fetch it for me please.
exotic robes
I don't know whether or not you will have to gather each feather individually, but I would like a cape of Durin feathers or the like.
golden sleeves
I doubt there are any happy bone shields but find one with some sort of emotion.
green psi-blade
Would you please bring me a talisman of evil\? Something an evil witch or hag would hold onto.
ice hound's tooth
a diamond dagger
Flaming blue balls doesn't sound like something I would want a pair of so just relieve the owner of one for me please.
a dress of silk and velvet rags
a faerie script
a flametongue called 'Firebrand'
Gaius has interesting armor, heavy, but interesting.
a flaming phoenix feather
I find myself needing to purify a few sections of my hoard; perhaps a wand would aid me with this.
I found a bare spot in my collection that would benefit from a plain staff, or staff of a plane.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("the staff of the lower planes","locker")

trigger.match: the Netherworld Dagger
I have a leather restorer and preservative I would like to test on some leather armor that has seen better days.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("a decaying vest made from cracked leather")

trigger.match: panthrodrine-skin leggings
I just want you to do a quick trip to Astral shift and grab me a guardian's weapon.
a ring of minor imagery
I need you to go visit with the Demogorgon and see if you can purchase his whip, or maybe he would give it to me as a gift.
ring of the white flame
a black whip
ritual purification wand
a bloodletter flail
a bloodstained blindfold
a blueish-white stone
The location of the disc I want is considered a secret by some
A beacon from the stands would make me happy.
The master of death needs to lose his hood
A bow made of gold would be a fine addition to my collection.
a glowing iron skewer
The monks are guarding something. Have a \"talk\" with Harold and see what you can bring me.
a golden bow
a green web veil
a grim bone shield
a heavy shroud
I probably wouldn't want to encounter bugs attached to green webbing, but a veil made of such stuff intrigues me.
I require a blindfold that has seen some action. Don't waste my time with the one that blind Fae wears.
signet of the Pure Flame
I still don't understand why a mage would wield a sledgehammer, maybe it has something to do with the black rock from which it is made.
silver dagger with a golden handle
I think there might be some hidden information on a crumpled note on the Kzinti plane.
staff of prophecy
I used to like to walk the straight and narrow line. Please bring me something that will help tell me where I'm going.
steel broadsword
stone platemail
A river of blood should make for some interesting flails.
a incantation note
The thing I desire from you mostly resembles a spear, though it hardly qualifies.
a lavabomb
a massive slate-grey sledgehammer
These feathers may try to elude you but I expect you to get them for me anyway.
a pair of kzinti slaughter gloves
a pair of wind-ravaged boots
I would just love to get my hands on the cloak of the Ruler of the Water plane.
sultan's turban
Imagine the most Goth wand possible then find it and bring it back to me.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("black wand with a grinning skull")

trigger.match: the black sword of the keep
Is it there or isn't it\? Your back will know when you encounter this blade
the blade of Discord
the earthen mace of might
the mark of madness
Though the item would make one think otherwise, I would be eternally happy if you were to gather a clasp for me.
a radiance of wickedness
a ram's head staff
a red bracer
Thy task involves an axe. Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two.
trigger.send: SubNameAlleg("axe of the third plane","locker raposao")

trigger.match: a rock hammer
You will have to jump through a few hurdles but I know you have it in you to find a faerie script for my collection.
You will probably have to get them custom made, but I would like some coarse leather boots.
It is no katana, but it is still a dancing sword. Bring me this minor wonder.
You would think that the boy will know you are coming to take his prophetic staff away and give it to me.
It isn't Oni's kit, maybe it should be mine.
the sceptre of creation
the staff of the lower planes
the whip, "Death-Tamer"
vial of unfinished portal serum
Omayra's kit
Try not to get eaten while retrieving a dha for me.
Be a lamb and fetch me a knife from Karnath.
Try not to lose anything yourself while gathering a green blade for me.
a sacrificial knife
Turning big rocks into little rocks by having big rocks wield little rocks I reckon could be useful.
Bring me a Sultan's head! Or the turban that rests on it at least.
a seething ball of blue flame
Turning big rocks into little rocks by having big rocks wield little rocks, what madness.
Bring me a dagger I can use to cut glass.
a shaleskin arm guard
Unicorn horns are said to possess great magic. I want one to test out the properties it possesses.
Bring me a fiery ring.
a shard-embedded whip
a show of loyalty
an ice bow
an ice collar
Let's sow a little discord; we just need the right weapon.
an ice hound's tooth
Madness and wickedness, Elaxor radiates both.
yellow psi-blade
an iron dha
Malafont's armor, I want it.
an iron web shield
Maybe if it was pure the elder wouldn't throw this clear thing around.

muclient.script:
function SubNameAlleg(name, moreInfo) if moreInfo == nil then ColourNote ("orange", "black", "Allegaagse says '" .. name .. "'") else ColourNote ("orange", "black", "Allegaagse says '" .. name .. " (" .. moreInfo .. ")'") end
SetClipboard(name) end
